content: HDI Stop drill bits SDS Plus (TE-CX) hammer stop drill bit for installing anchors for fastening pipes, air ducts and suspended ceilings ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Inserts- - - ### FEATURES:Features Drill holes precisely to the desired depth No need to change tools – drilling and setting can be done with the same tool Up to 50% faster than the traditional method (overhead hammering) – increasing productivity Large rubber grip for easier handling Helps to ensure correct and consistent installation Applications Installation of HDI drop-in anchors for fastening pipes, air ducts and suspended ceilings Drilling holes to an accurate depth ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-C (SDS Plus) Anchor type: Flush anchors Working mode: Hammer drilling Technical Data | Connection end | TE-C (SDS Plus) | Anchor type | Flush anchors | Working mode | Hammer drilling | Head shape | Multi Cutter | Head material composition | Tungsten carbide | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2313922 - Stop drill bit HDI+/HDI-TZ ½ - Package Size 1 pc - 2313919 - Stop drill bit HDI+(L) ¼” - Package Size 1 pc - 2313921 - Stop drill bit HDI+(L) 3/8” - Package Size 1 pc - 2417766 - HDI-P TZ 1/2 Stop Drill Bit - Package Size 1 pc - 2313920 - Stop drill bit HDI-P 3/8” - Package Size 1 pc - 2419472 - HDI-P TZ ¼” / 3/8” Stop Drill Bit - Package Size 1 pc - 2419226 - HDI-TZ 3/8” Stop Drill Bit - Package Size 1 pc - 2418818 - HDI-TZ 5/8 Stop Drill Bit - Package Size 1 pc
